CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(UTM_Term__c, "Pre-booking"), "Opt-in", IF( OR(Tickets_in_order__c = 0, ISBLANK(Tickets_in_order__c)), "No booking", IF( Remaining_Tickets__c = 0, "Cancelled", IF( Remaining_Tickets__c >= 1, "Booked", "" ) ) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automatically sets "Booked" if Remaining Tickets is 1 or greater // Automatically sets "Cancelled" if its 0. If there is no number, leaves field empty
CustomField.label: Booking Status
